alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 1:29AM PST until December 02 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...White Pine County and Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County. * WHEN...From 10 PM Thursday to 4 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
